title: BOOKING DAO BUGDET
body:
This vote decides the initial budget allocation.
Once the DAO is up and running and users have SWS governance tokens to vote, we will be able to adjust it continuously.
Funds will come from subscriptions and will be added to the DAO automatically.
The funds can be moved only via a vote.

![pie](https://tripscommunity.com/en/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2021/03/Booking-DAO-PIE.png)

# BUDGET

## Platform Development: 20%
This includes the monthly subscription for the platform we are already paying now, and future costs.								

## Web3 Marketing Rewards: 15%
We have a small army of people who share our content. They are today paid in Trips. With this budget we can also pay them in xDAI.
								
## Airdrops: 10%
We will airdrop tokens (Trips and others) to people who use the platform/vote on governance and in general help the project.								

## Traditional Marketing: 10%
Facebook/Google and others. We'll try to keep this to a minimum but we need to reach hosts out of the crypto world.
								
## Approvals Team: 10%
The people who will analyse each new listing and help owners to improve them.								

## TripsCommunity fund: 10%
The Trips Community is an incubator of the project. This goes in the Trips Community budget.								

## Trips-xDAI Honeyswap liquidity pool: 5%
A well funded pool makes the Trips token more real. It's been growing well lately [>>](https://info.honeyswap.org/pair/0x5426a4d0926d6cd2c003241d8fb1c9420e43ed26)

![Trips-xDAI Honeyswap liquidity pool](https://tripscommunity.com/en/wp-content/uploads/sites/3/2021/03/honeyswap-liquidity-pool.png)

								
## Booking DAO fund: 5% 
A long term fund with vested for 12 months. It can be also used for yield farming.	
						
## "OTHERS fund: 5% 
When a great idea pops up, we'll have some funds ready for funding it.	

## Referrals: 5%		
For a future implementation of referrals.				

## Insurance: 3%
When something goes wrong, we'll have a way to mitigate the damage.								

## Education: 2%
To onboard the travel industry we need to teach the basics of Web3 first.
That's what we have been doing since the beginning but now we need to make this systematically.

# DO YOU AGREE WITH  THIS PROPOSAL?
author: 0xce73904422880604e78591fD6c758B0D5106dD50
